Talented.TalentDef.label: Mass Manipulation
Talented.TalentDef.description: Your mastery over gravity allows you to manipulate the mass of objects and enhance your physical capabilities.

Talented.TalentDef.label: Gravity Well
Talented.TalentDef.description: Create a zone of intense gravitational force that slows and crushes enemies caught within.

Talented.TalentDef.label: Zero Gravity Mastery
Talented.TalentDef.description: Your control over gravitational forces allows you to create zones of weightlessness, enhancing mobility and defense.

Talented.TalentDef.label: Singularity Burst
Talented.TalentDef.description: Unleash a concentrated burst of gravitational force, creating a temporary singularity that devastates the target area.
